Our Facilities & Capabilities

Combining technology and expertise to deliver world-class quality.

Foundry Facilities

  • Melting capacity: 750 kg furnaces
  • Moulding lines: ARPA and Hand Mould
  • Core shop & fettling facilities
  • Grades: Cast Iron & Ductile Iron (up to 220 kg per piece)

Testing Facilities

  • Spectrometer for chemical control
  • UTM Machine for tensile testing
  • Hardness testing machine
  • Quality inspection & process control systems

Machining Facilities

Our advanced Machine Shop includes:

  • AMS (VMC) MCV 450 – X:800, Y:500, Z:500
  • LMW JV Kraft X – X:800, Y:450, Z:510
  • ACE LT20 Turning Dia 200mm, Z:250mm
  • Coordinate Measuring Machine, Surface Tester

Additional Services

  • 3D Scanning
  • Simulation
  • Reverse Engineering
